import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './App.css'; const App = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('virtual-model'); const [activeStage, setActiveStage] = useState(null); const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false); const [processStep, setProcessStep] = useState(0); const [materials] = useState({ castorOil: { name: 'Castor Oil', color: '#FFD700' }, distilledWater: { name: 'Distilled Water', color: '#87CEEB' }, naoh: { name: 'Sodium Hydroxide', color: '#FF6B6B' }, glycerol: { name: 'Glycerol', color: '#98FB98' }, nacl: { name: 'Sodium Chloride', color: '#F0F8FF' }, nahco3: { name: 'Sodium Bicarbonate', color: '#DDA0DD' } }); const sections = [ { id: 'virtual-model', name: 'Virtual Model', icon: 'üè≠' }, { id: 'process-flow', name: 'Process Flow', icon: '‚öóÔ∏è' }, { id: 'materials', name: 'Raw Materials', icon: 'üß™' }, { id: 'equipment', name: 'Equipment', icon: '‚öôÔ∏è' }, { id: 'quality', name: 'Quality Control', icon: '‚úÖ' }, { id: 'safety', name: 'Safety', icon: 'üõ°Ô∏è' } ]; const startProcess = () => { setIsProcessing(true); setProcessStep(1); }; useEffect(() => { if (isProcessing && processStep < 6) { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setProcessStep(prev => prev + 1); }, 2000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); } else if (processStep >= 6) { setIsProcessing(false); } }, [isProcessing, processStep]); const renderContent = () => { switch(activeSection) { case 'virtual-model': return renderVirtualModel(); case 'process-flow': return

; case 'materials': return

; case 'quality': return

; case 'safety': return

Safety Protocols

; default: return renderVirtualModel(); } }; const renderVirtualModel = () => (
